metadata.name: Eagle: The Original Adventures
metadata.description: The night is thick with 1000 ninjas again! Neil Vokes, Jack Herman and Rich Rankin created one of the most enduring indie icons of the 1980s with Eagle! One part supernatural horror and one part ninjitsu action, Eagle is 100% enthralling and guaranteed to take you back to a time when black & white comics were shaking the comic world to its core. Step into the world of Eagle once again and experience the hidden fight against the forces of the supernatural!
